youtube.title: How Glasses Correct Eye Misalignment in Children | Strabismus Explained
youtube.description: Discover how glasses can treat eye misalignment or Strabismus in children. This short biology lesson shows the instant impact of corrective lenses on eye positioning. Learn why early intervention is vital for healthy pediatric vision. #eyehealth #biology #medical
